description: Associates a VPC with a service network.

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 200  
Pattern: ^sg-(([0-9a-z]{8})|([0-9a-z]{17}))$  
Update requires: No interruption

SecurityGroupIds.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

ServiceNetworkIdentifier.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^((sn-[0-9a-z]{17})|(arn:[a-z0-9\-]+:vpc-lattice:[a-zA-Z0-9\-]+:\d{12}:servicenetwork/sn-[0-9a-z]{17}))$  
Update requires: Replacement

VpcIdentifier.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 5  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^vpc-(([0-9a-z]{8})|([0-9a-z]{17}))$  
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

ServiceNetworkIdentifier.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^((sn-[0-9a-z]{17})|(arn:[a-z0-9\-]+:vpc-lattice:[a-zA-Z0-9\-]+:\d{12}:servicenetwork/sn-[0-9a-z]{17}))$  
Update requires: No interruption

VpcIdentifier.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 5  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^vpc-(([0-9a-z]{8})|([0-9a-z]{17}))$  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:[a-z0-9\-]+:vpc-lattice:[a-zA-Z0-9\-]+:\d{12}:servicenetworkvpcassociation/snva-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

CreatedAt.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Id.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 22  
Maximum Length: 22  
Pattern: ^snva-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

ServiceNetworkArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:[a-z0-9\-]+:vpc-lattice:[a-zA-Z0-9\-]+:\d{12}:servicenetwork/sn-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

ServiceNetworkId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 20  
Pattern: ^sn-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

ServiceNetworkName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 63  
Pattern: ^(?!servicenetwork-)(?![-])(?!.*[-]$)(?!.*[-]{2})[a-z0-9-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Status.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: CREATE_IN_PROGRESS | ACTIVE | UPDATE_IN_PROGRESS | DELETE_IN_PROGRESS | CREATE_FAILED | DELETE_FAILED  
Update requires: No interruption

VpcId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 5  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^vpc-(([0-9a-z]{8})|([0-9a-z]{17}))$  
Update requires: No interruption
